staxel.village.character.dialogue.MorelB: (안함)I was happy being one with the mushrooms!
(안함)Though, I suppose we couldn't be good friends if you hadn't...
(안함)That's quite an impressive tool ^c:1486b0;Cirahna^c:pop; made for you...
(안함)But please don't point it at any of my mushrooms...
(안함)The only issue I have with mushrooms is the spores...
(안함)I think... I think I might be allergic...
